sentences.en: Exhibiting a milky iridescence like that of an opal.
sentences.cn: 一种红色的蛋白石,有闪烁的变彩小斑.

sentences.en: For day by day he felt more and more like a bubble filled with darkness, round which whirled the iridescence of his consciousness .
sentences.cn: 他日益感到自己象一个充满黑色的泡沫，四周缠绕着自身意识的彩虹。

sentences.en: The costs of melanin - based plumage and iridescence are clearly different from this.
sentences.cn: 黑色素翅膀和彩虹色翅膀的代价与上面却完全不同.

sentences.en: The huge pool of blood in front of her was already assuming the iridescence of coagulation; and when the sun rose a hundred prismatic hues were reflected from it.
sentences.cn: 她面前的一摊血水已经凝固了，宛如彩虹的色彩；当太阳升起来时，上面就反射出一百种光谱的颜色。

sentences.en: The huge pool of blood in front of her was already assuming the iridescence of coagulation.
sentences.cn: 她面前那一滩血,已经凝结了起来,显出五光十色.

sentences.en: Tiny layers in the wing scales of blue morpho butterflies reflect light at multiple angles, leading to the interference patterns we see as iridescence.
sentences.cn: 蓝色大闪蝶翅膀上的细微层状结构会以不同角度反射光线，从而呈现出彩虹一般的干涉图样来。

sentences.en: Using tissue paper will produce an unusual iridescence, as some of the foil will shine through.
sentences.cn: 当某些箔片的亮光透过棉纸时,棉纸能产生一种不同寻常的彩虹色.

sentences.en: When sunlight or moonlight passes through a layer of thin clouds, the result can be iridescence.
sentences.cn: 阳光或月光穿过薄薄的云层就会形成虹彩。

sentences.en: You can see the iridescence on their faces.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到他们脸上的彩虹色。

trans.tran_cn: 彩虹色，放光彩，晕色，晕彩
